summary: The diff largely implements the requested premium theme refresh, centered layout, consistent button styling, and the default-bio + safe localStorage bio migration. However, it also introduces additional functional behavior (URL validation/toasts and social-link filtering/migrations) that goes beyond a pure visual/UX polish pass.

hallucinated_features.description: Added outbound URL validation on link click with toast error messaging (security/injection prevention behavior).
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest specifies “No new features… visual/UX polish pass only”; click-time URL blocking and new helper logic changes behavior beyond styling.
evidence: frontend-file-summaries.txt (mentions new isValidOutboundUrl helper for click-time validation)

hallucinated_features.description: Introduced/expanded toast notification system usage for share success/failure and invalid link URL.
hallucinated_features.reason: Toasts are functional UX behavior not explicitly requested; Share UX changes were not part of requirements.

hallucinated_features.description: Automatically filters/removes Twitter/X and Instagram links from stored profile data and/or rendering, and adds a dedicated Instagram button behavior (beyond preserving URLs).
hallucinated_features.reason: Non-goals include “Adding new social networks or new outbound link types”; while not adding a new network, the automatic removal/cleanup of existing link rows and dedicated handling is a behavioral change not requested (and also risks changing user-configured links).
evidence: frontend/src/App.tsx (filteredLinks filters out Twitter/X and Instagram)
frontend/src/features/profile/useProfileLocalStorage.ts (cleanupSocialLinks removes Twitter/X and Instagram; Snapchat migration adds/normalizes Snapchat link)

hallucinated_features.description: Added a placeholder hook file (useQueries.ts) unrelated to the UI/UX profile landing page improvements.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by the BuildRequest and not necessary for the specified UI polish scope.
